game.name: Spin the World
game.shortDescription: 세계를 회전하면 괴물과 유령의 전체 위험한 세계에서 탈출해야하는 사수 요소와 동적 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spin the World is an intense platformer where you escape a dangerous realm. Battle monsters and ghosts using pistols, a machine gun, and a shotgun. Avoid thorns to survive, respawning at checkpoints if you die. With stunning graphics and dynamic gameplay, embrace your destiny in this thrilling world
